summary: When hired killer John Gant rides into Lordsburg, the town's folk become paranoid as each leading citizen has enemies capable of using the services of a professional killer for personal revenge.
cast: Audie Murphy|Charles Drake|Joan Evans|Virginia Grey|Warren Stevens|R.G. Armstrong|Willis Bouchey|Edgar Stehli|Simon Scott|Karl Swenson|Whit Bissell|Charles Watts|John Alderson|Jerry Paris|Russ Bender|James Hyland|Fern Barry|John Barton|Marjorie Bennett|Charles Cane|Bill Clark|Hugh Corcoran|Russell Custer|Edgar Dearing|Jimmy Dime|Harold Goodwin|Herman Hack|Al Haskell|Helen Jay|Jess Kirkpatrick|William Mims|Hank Patterson|Volney Peavyhouse|Jack Perrin|Vincent Perry|Dennis Rush|Sam Savitsky|Bob Steele|James Van Horn|Guy Wilkerson
title: Una bala sin nombre
